field.label: What page you are currently configuring URLs for. Used for setting the page_id on new routes

field.helptext: Determines whether a parameter segment is optional or not

field.label: Route segment contains an invalid character
field.helptext: Used to show / hide an error message on each route segment if it has an invalid character

field.label: Used to determine which segment is the first one so that it can't be removed

field.formula: IF(LEN(IF({{route}} == "" or {{route}} == "/",{{$Model.App.data.0.base_url}},{{$Model.App.data.0.base_url}} + "/" + {{route}}))>40, JOIN_TEXT("",LEFT(IF({{route}} == "" or {{route}} == "/",{{$Model.App.data.0.base_url}},{{$Model.App.data.0.base_url}} + "/" + {{route}}),40),"..."), IF({{route}} == "" or {{route}} == "/",{{$Model.App.data.0.base_url}},{{$Model.App.data.0.base_url}} + "/" + {{route}}) )

field.label: UI Fully-Qualified Route

field.helptext: Used to enable / disable save when a route is being configured

this will take you to App Composer

skuid__text.contents: You haven't added any pages to this app

Pages must be added and assigned a URL before they can be accessed by end users within this app.

For more information, see our Deployment documentation
You haven't created any app permission sets
App permission sets determine user access for pages and data. Unless you create and assign these permission sets, users only have access via their site permission set.
You haven't added any users to this app
Users are added to apps via their permission sets, either through a site permission set or an app permission set. Until you add users, they cannot access your app.

enableConditions.message: There are no app permission sets available to grant user access.
There are no app permission sets available to grant user access.

tooltip.text: Visible to anyone with the file's URL

skuid__text.contents: It will no longer be usable in this app's pages. Pages currently using this file may have issues.
Your file will not be deleted from this site. To delete a file, go to Settings > Files.
You haven't added any files to this app

Files uploaded to this site are not accessible in this app's pages until they are added to the app.

Upload new files here to automatically add them to this app, or add existing files.
It will no longer be usable in this app's pages. Pages currently using this data source may have issues.
Your data source will not be deleted from this site. To delete a data source, go to Data Sources.
You haven't added any data sources to this app

Data sources are how Skuid models connect to your data. They cannot be used in an app page until they are added to the app.

For more information, see our Data documentation.
You haven't created a mobile package yet

You can't create a page from XML if applying a master page

skuid__text.contents:
URL merge variables and page parameters

URL merge variables may be added to the URL slug above to be passed to the Skuid page as page parameters.

Explain parameters 
  • animals: No parameters provided. 
  • animal/{animalName}: If the user goes to /animal/squid, the parameter "animalName" will display in the page with value "squid."
  • animal/{animalName?}: The parameter "animalName" is optional, so /animal/squid or /animal will both match.
The home page URL is generated by using your app's name as a slug and appending it to your Skuid site URL.

This page uses a different design system than the one selected for this app. This page's design system will not be added as an app resource.

Consider updating the page to use the {{default_design_system}} design system. Otherwise you may see visual inconsistencies and deployment issues.

actionsequence.label: Update Specific Row
actionsequence.description: Update a specific row that matches the given value. updateModel: Model to search and update key: search value used to find the desired row to update searchField: field on updateModel to compare to the key value fieldToUpdate: field on updateModel to update updateValue: value to set fieldToUpdate

actionsequence.label: Remove Specific Row
actionsequence.description: Update a specific row that matches the given value. removeModel: Model to search and remove specific rows key: search value used to find the desired row to remove searchField: field on removeModel to compare to the key value

actionsequence.description: Check input value for invalid characters
